message: Let's split it fairly, I'm willing to compromise!
You were too generous, I'll take a bigger share this time!
Let's meet in the middle, I'm willing to compromise again!
You're still being too soft, I'm taking more this time!
You're pushing your luck, Bob! I'm taking a firmer stance this time.
You're getting desperate, I'm taking almost all this time!
You're taking advantage of me, Bob. I'm taking a stand, but I'm not going to get taken for a ride.
You're being ridiculous, I'm taking almost everything now!
Fine, take it all. I'm done negotiating with you.
